title: Pierre Bouysse
text:
Pierre Bouysse is a French former professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
Bouysse began playing youth and amateur football as a goalkeeper with <a href="Aurillac%20FCA">Aurillac FCA</a>. He has played professionally in <a href="Ligue%202">Ligue 2</a> for <a href="FC%20Gueugnon">FC Gueugnon</a>, <a href="CS%20Sedan%20Ardennes">CS Sedan Ardennes</a> and <a href="Clermont%20Foot">Clermont Foot</a>.
